unnormalised: Hey folks, Delhi traffic’s getting a makeover! New traffic regulations are rolling out next week, targeting everything from rash driving on NH8 to parking woes in Karol Bagh.
normalised: Hey folks, Delhi traffic is getting a makeover! New traffic regulations are rolling out next week, targeting everything from rash driving on N H eight to parking woes in Karol Bagh.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from the Delhi Traffic Police announced stricter enforcement of lane discipline. Apparently, too many folks think it's okay to zig-zag like they're weaving through a Diwali mela.
normalised: Doctor Sharma from the Delhi Traffic Police announced stricter enforcement of lane discipline. Apparently, too many folks think it is okay to zig-zag like they are weaving through a Diwali mela.

unnormalised: Expect hefty fines, starting from Rs. 5000 for repeated offenses. They’re also cracking down on illegal parking, especially around Chandni Chowk where finding parking is already tougher than getting a confirmed train ticket during Diwali!
normalised: Expect hefty fines, starting from rupee five thousand for repeated offenses. They are also cracking down on illegal parking, especially around Chandni Chowk where finding parking is already tougher than getting a confirmed train ticket during Diwali!

unnormalised: The city's investing in more CCTV cameras covering wider areas, like that blind spot near AIIMS. Think of it as "Big Brother" but for safer roads.
normalised: The city is investing in more C C T V cameras covering wider areas, like that blind spot near A I I M S. Think of it as "Big Brother" but for safer roads.

unnormalised: Plus, new rules require commercial vehicles to have at least 100 sq ft of designated parking space.
normalised: Plus, new rules require commercial vehicles to have at least one hundred square feet of designated parking space.

unnormalised: Remember that pesky speed limit on the Yamuna Expressway? They're reviewing those too, possibly increasing it a bit.
normalised: Remember that pesky speed limit on the Yamuna Expressway? They are reviewing those too, possibly increasing it a bit.

unnormalised: All this to make our roads safer and less of a headache. Let’s try to follow the rules, shall we? Jai Hind!
normalised: All this to make our roads safer and less of a headache. Let us try to follow the rules, shall we? Jai Hind!
